snippet.title: “Imperfect” Announcement Trailer (New Indie Horror)
snippet.description:
Reveal hidden secrets and horrors in a dark and dangerous landscape. Free Demo coming VERY soon. 

WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1644660/Imperfect/

“Imperfect” is a solo developed indie horror game with a unique style that uses the legendary art of 18th century Master Gustave Doré to build its world. Uncover the story of Samuel Judge, and the mysterious place he is trapped in. The game will be in episodic format for PC initially. Part I coming soon!

FOLLOW MY JOURNEY ON SOCIAL
https://linktr.ee/Imperfectgamedev

#indiegame #indiegames #indiedev #solodev #horrorstories #horrorgaming #videogames #videogame #games #gamedesign #game #trailer #trailers
